docs.snippet: A new film about Yitzhak Rabin’s 1995 assassination in Israel could serve as a warning about Donald Trump and Ben Carson’s divisive, bigoted campaigns....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new film about Yitzhak Rabin’s 1995 assassination in Israel could serve as a warning about Donald Trump and Ben Carson’s divisive, bigoted campaigns.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column warns film 'Rabin: The Last Day,'  which attributes assassination of Israeli prime minister to climate created by stoking of irresponsibly hateful rhetoric, parallels atmosphere of Republican presidential campaign.

headline.main: Politicians Seeing Evil, Hearing Evil, Speaking Evil
headline.print_headline: Saw Evil, Heard Evil, Spoke Evil

docs.snippet: A South Carolina city on Wednesday is honoring the victims of a shooting massacre by renaming part of the street in front of the historic black church where they died the "Mother Emanuel Way Memorial District."...
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Carolina city on Wednesday is honoring the victims of a shooting massacre by renaming part of the street in front of the historic black church where they died the "Mother Emanuel Way Memorial District."

headline.main: Charleston to Honor Church Shooting Victims With Street Dedication
headline.print_headline: Charleston to Honor Church Shooting Victims With Street Dedication

docs.snippet: Federal inmates at an Oklahoma prison said Wednesday they are hoping a documentary featuring President Barack Obama's July visit to the facility and in-depth interviews with six of the prisoners will influence policymakers to re-examine harsh sent...
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal inmates at an Oklahoma prison said Wednesday they are hoping a documentary featuring President Barack Obama's July visit to the facility and in-depth interviews with six of the prisoners will influence policymakers to re-examine harsh sentences for nonviolent drug offenders.

headline.main: Documentary Featuring Obama Prison Visit Debuts in Oklahoma
headline.print_headline: Documentary Featuring Obama Prison Visit Debuts in Oklahoma

docs.snippet: Seeking to warm bilateral ties and project a sunny climate for U.S. business, Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed on Wednesday to cut restrictions on foreign investment, while his chief Internet regulator appeared to lay the groundwork for a basic ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seeking to warm bilateral ties and project a sunny climate for U.S. business, Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed on Wednesday to cut restrictions on foreign investment, while his chief Internet regulator appeared to lay the groundwork for a basic agreement later this week on cyber warfare.

headline.main: China's Xi Promises Better Investment Climate, Cyber War Deal Seen
headline.print_headline: China's Xi Promises Better Investment Climate, Cyber War Deal Seen
